xmlText.p: MIAMI MARLINS — Agreed to terms with 1B Jonathan Rodriguez on a minor league contract.
SIOUX FALLS CANARIES — Released INF Trey Vavra and C Mike Falsetti.
WICHITA WINGNUTS — Signed INF Abel Nieves.
WINNIPEG GOLDEYES — Signed RHP Charle Rosario.
NEW JERSEY JACKALS — Signed LHP Jose Velez, INF Josh Silver and RHP Dylan Brammer.
SUSSEX COUNTY MINERS — Signed RHP Aroni Nina and OF Jose R Gomez.
TENNESSEE TITANS — Agreed to terms with QB Tyler Ferguson on a futures contract.
WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS — Agreed to terms with CB Chris Randle on a two-year contract.
NEW YORK ISLANDERS — Recalled F Ross Johnston from Bridgeport (AHL).
NEW YORK RANGERS — Recalled D Tony DeAngelo and F Daniel Catenacci from Hartford (AHL).
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Signed F Chris Langkow to a professional tryout agreement.
ECHL — Suspended Kansas City coach John-Scott Dicksonr one game and fined him an undisclosed amount for his actions during a Jan. 13 game at Toledo.
ATLANTA UNITED — Acquired M Ezequiel Barco from Club Atletico Independiente (Argentine Superleague).
DC UNITED — Acquired $200,000 in allocation money from Los Angeles FC for the third overall pick in the 2018 MLS SuperDraft.
NEW YORK CITY FC — Signed F Jo Inge Berget.
PHILADELPHIA UNION — Acquired M David Accam from Chicago for $1.2 million in allocation money.
PORTLAND TIMBERS — Signed F Foster Langsdorf.
ILLINOIS — Named Rod Smith offensive coordinator/quarterbacks coach.
NORTH CAROLINA — Named Quinshad Davis offensive graduate football assistant.
PURDUE — Announced the resignation of assistant football coach Tony Levine.
